chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s1 s3

Premises:
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
mpl_compat_1 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s0 s2
dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
mpl_compat_0 : forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl0) (M1 prec_list c pl1) -> pl_compat pl0 pl1
borne_0_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map prec_list) (p : prec_list), (prec_in_state m0 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m0) -> (prec_in_state m1 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m1) -> prec_in_state (M2 prec_list m0 m1) p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M2 prec_list m0 m1)
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
mapcanon_M2 : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2) -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2)
borne_0_1 : forall (a : ad) (p' p : prec_list), prec_in_state (M1 prec_list a p') p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M1 prec_list a p')
M2_canon : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2)
M2_eqmap_2 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m1 m3
M2_eqmap_1 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m0 m2
borne_1_0 : forall s : state, state_in_dta (M0 state) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M0 state)
pl_compat = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl0 = prec_empty /\ pl1 = prec_empty \/ pl0 <> prec_empty /\ pl1 <> prec_empty : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
MapDisjoint_M2_r : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3
MapDisjoint_M2_l : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m0 m2
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
MapDisjoint_M2 : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B m0 m2 -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3 -> MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3)
borne_1_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map state) (s : state), (state_in_dta m0 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m0) -> (state_in_dta m1 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m1) -> state_in_dta (M2 state m0 m1) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M2 state m0 m1)
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rect : forall P : prec_list -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rec : forall P : prec_list -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
state_in_dta_M0_false : forall s : state, ~ state_in_dta (M0 state) s
mapcanon_M2_1 : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A m1
mapcanon_M2_2 : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A m2
mapcanon_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (y : A), P (M1 A a y)) -> (forall m1 m2 : Map A, mapcanon A m1 -> P m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> P m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> P (M2 A m1 m2)) -> forall m : Map A, mapcanon A m -> P m
prec_contained_ind : forall P : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P p p) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> P p p1 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> forall p p0 : prec_list, prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
MapGet_M2_bit_0_0 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = false -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m (N.div2 a)
MapGet_M2_bit_0_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = true -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m' (N.div2 a)
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
semantic_equiv_0_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s
Map2_semantics_2_eq : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (f : ad -> option A), eqm A (MapGet A (M2 A m m')) f -> eqm A (MapGet A m') (fun a : ad => f (N.succ_double a))
Map2_semantics_1_eq : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (f : ad -> option A), eqm A (MapGet A (M2 A m m')) f -> eqm A (MapGet A m) (fun a : ad => f (N.double a))
